article_title: Watch Raw Footage of French Police Raids Killing Terrorists
article_text:
Twelve people were murdered Wednesday in a terrorist attack on the Charlie Hebdo satirical newspaper headquarters in France. Today, French police raided two locations to save multiple hostages and eventually kill the two brothers suspected of the newspaper attack. We have raw footage of the events here:

1) Here’s a video of the scene at a commercial printing house near Charles de Gaulle Airport where the two brothers, Cherif and Said Kouachi, were holding a hostage. According to AP, the suspects are dead, and their hostage is unharmed and free.

2) This video gives a glimpse of a second police raid at a Kosher supermarket on the eastern edges of the capital where an alleged associate of the Kouachi brothers was holding more hostages.

>>> French Police Kill Terrorists Suspected in Charlie Hebdo Massacre

article_metadata.description: Watch raw footage of two police raids in France Friday that resulted in the death of two brothers suspected of murder in the Charlie Hebdo attack.
